exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V g, dg : R -> R a, b : R H : forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> continuous f (g x) H0 : forall x : R, Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b -> is_derive g x (dg x) /\\ continuous dg x Unable to unify "forall P : ?V -> Prop, locally ?M2369 P -> filtermap (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (?M2368 - ?M2367)) (Riemann_sum ?M2366 ptd)) (Riemann_fine ?M2367 ?M2368) P" with "RInt (fun y : R => scal (dg y) (f (g y))) a b = RInt f (g a) (g b)".

original: intros. apply is_RInt_ext. - intros y H. unfold scal. now rewrite RInt_comp_lin. - apply is_RInt_comp; auto.
